p: Considering climate change scenarios, there is a general consensus among the 32 models evaluated, for both RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 scenarios, in the direction of the projected temperature change for the state of SÃ£o Paulo, with both experiments presenting increases. After 2050, the anomalies of RCP8.5 become larger than those from the RCP4.5 experiment, showing larger increases in temperature anomalies.
